name: Kinnaur
description: Kinnaur is known for its stunning landscapes, apple orchards, and rich cultural heritage. The district offers a perfect blend of adventure, spirituality, and natural beauty, with the majestic Himalayas as its backdrop.

locations.name: Kalpa
locations.description: Kalpa is a scenic town known for its apple orchards and stunning views of the Kinner Kailash range. It's a perfect destination for nature lovers and photography enthusiasts.
locations.hours: Best time to visit: April to June, September to November
